title: Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and Planting Material, other than Seed) 
(Amendment) (No.2) Regulations 2020.

title: Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are
heading: 2. The European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and 
Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are 
amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the definition of “Directive” (as 
amended by the European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating 
and Plant Material, other than Seed) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 
59 of 2020), the following – 

(as amended by Commission 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive No. 2008/72/EC of 15th July 
20082 
Implementing Decision 
2013/166/EU of 2 April 20133, Commission Implementing Directive 
2013/45/EU of 7th August 20134 and Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2019/990 of 17 June 2019)5 and Commission Directive 
93/61/EEC of 2 July 19936 
(as amended by Commission 
Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 11 February 2020);”. 

1 OJ L 41, 11.02.2020, P.1 
2 OJ L205, 01.08.2008 P.28 
3 OJ L94, 04.04.2013, P.8 
4 OJ L213 08.08.0203, p.20 
5 OJ L160, 18.06.2019, P.14 
6 OJ L 250, 7.10.1993, p. 19 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and 
Plant Material, other than Seed) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 59 
of 2020) are revoked. 

[200] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [200]

title: Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 by amending the Directive as they relate to 
inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine pests (RNQPs) and measures 
intended to prevent their presence on vegetable propagating and planting 
material other than seed for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [200] 5
